name: AdHocConnection
desc: A connection between two PortReferences.

name: AdHocConnection.new
desc: Creates a new AdHocConnection between two PortReferences.

name: dst
desc: The destination load port of the connection.

name: isNet
desc:
Indicates whether this connection is a net connection (i.e., both
PortReferences are LogicNets).

name: src
desc: The source driver port of the connection.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: BridgeInterface
desc: A custom interface created dynamically from a provided specification.

name: BridgeInterface.new
desc:
Reads portsFromConsumer, portsFromProvider and portsSharedInouts
then creates appropriate ports with appropriate tags.

name: BridgeInterface.ofJson
desc: Creates a custom BridgeInterface from json.

name: clone
desc: Creates a new Interface with the same ports as this.

name: library
desc: library of intf

name: name
desc: name of intf

name: vendor
desc: vendor of intf

name: version
desc: version of intf

name: BridgeModule
desc:
A specialized module class that extends ROHD's Module with advanced
connectivity and hierarchy management capabilities.

name: BridgeModule.fromJson
desc: Creates a BridgeModule from a JSON module description.

name: BridgeModule.new
desc: Creates a new BridgeModule with enhanced connectivity capabilities.

name: addInOut
desc: Adds an inOut in the same way as the base Module does.

name: addInOutArray
desc: Adds an inOut array in the same way as the base Module does.

name: addInput
desc: Adds an input in the same way as the base Module does.

name: addInputArray
desc: Adds an input array port with enhanced name management.

name: addInterface
desc: Adds an interface to this module with comprehensive configuration options.

name: addOutput
desc:
Registers an output to this Module and returns an output port that
can be driven by this Module or consumed outside of it.

name: addOutputArray
desc:
Registers and returns an output LogicArray port to this Module with
the specified dimensions, elementWidth, and numUnpackedDimensions
named name.

name: addPortMap
desc: Creates a mapping between a module port and an interface port.

name: addStructMap
desc:
Creates a mapping from structFieldFullName to a PortReference, so that
each time port receives structFieldFullName, it will actually return
the specified reference.

name: addSubModule
desc: Adds a submodule to this module and establishes parent-child relationship.

name: allowUniquification
desc: Controls whether port and interface names can be automatically uniquified.

name: build
desc: Builds the Module and all subModules within it.

name: buildAndGenerateRTL
desc:
Calls build and generates SystemVerilog and a filelist into the
outputPath, with optional logging sent to the logger.

name: createArrayPort
desc:
Add array port with the given portName, direction, dimensions and
elementWidth.

name: createParameter
desc: Creates a parameter definition with configurable instantiation mapping.

name: createPort
desc: Creates a new port with the specified characteristics.

name: definitionParameters
desc:
A collection of SystemVerilog SystemVerilogParameterDefinitions to be
declared on the definition when generating SystemVerilog for this Module
if generatedDefinitionType is DefinitionGenerationType.standard.

name: definitionVerilog
desc: A custom SystemVerilog definition to be produced for this Module.

name: generatedDefinitionType
desc:
What kind of SystemVerilog definition this Module generates, or whether
it does at all.

name: hierarchy
desc:
Computes the same thing as Module.hierarchy after build, but can also
be run before build with only context about ROHD Bridge-aware hierarchy.

name: instantiationParameters
desc:
Pass-through parameters used when instantiating this module in
SystemVerilog.

name: instantiationVerilog
desc:
Generates custom SystemVerilog to be injected in place of a module
instantiation.

name: interface
desc: Gets a reference to an interface by name.

name: interfaces
desc: Unmodifiable map of all interfaces added to this module.

name: isSystemVerilogLeaf
desc: Indicates whether this module represents an external SystemVerilog leaf.

name: overrideParameter
desc: Override the value of a parameter named paramName with newValue.

name: parent
desc: The parent Module of this Module.

name: port
desc:
Creates a port reference from a string representation with advanced
parsing.

name: pullUpInterface
desc:
Creates a hierarchical connection by pulling an interface up from a
submodule.

name: pullUpParameter
desc: Pull up a passthrough parameter to this level

name: pullUpPort
desc:
Creates a hierarchical port connection by pulling a port up from a
submodule.

name: renamePort
desc:
Creates a logical alias for an existing port without affecting RTL
generation.

name: renamedPorts
desc: Internal mapping of renamed ports for backwards compatibility.

name: structMap
desc: Map of struct member names to their corresponding packed bit slice ranges.

name: subBridgeModules
desc: All submodules that are instances of BridgeModule.

name: subModules
desc: Provides access to submodules before and after the build process.

name: tieOffInterface
desc: Tie off input ports of intfRef from to value.

name: BridgeModuleFromJson
desc: Extension methods for BridgeModule to support JSON parsing.

name: addFromJson
desc:
Populates ports, interfaces, and parameters from JSON representing the
full module.

name: addInterfacesFromJson
desc: Creates interfaces based on a JSON input.

name: addParametersFromJson
desc: Adds parameters to the module from the JSON parameterList.

name: addPortsFromJson
desc: Create ports in the module based on the portInfo and parameters.

name: addStructMapsFromJson
desc: Calls addStructMap for each entry in the structInfo map.

name: Connection
desc: Represents a connection between two References.

name: Connection.new
desc: Creates a new Connection between two RefType points.

name: hasPoint
desc: Indicates whether point is one of the points in this connection.

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: involvesModule
desc:
Indicates whether this connection involves the given module on either of
its points.

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: point1
desc: The first point of the connection.

name: point2
desc: The second point of the connection.

name: pointForModule
desc:
Returns the point in this connection that corresponds to the given
module, or null if this does not involvesModule.

name: ConnectionExtractor
desc: Analyzes a set of modules and provides connection information between them.

name: ConnectionExtractor.new
desc:
Creates a new ConnectionExtractor for the given modules which will
then identify connections between them.

name: connections
desc:
All the connections between modules, without tracing through any of the
boundaries of modules.

name: modules
desc: The set of modules to analyze for connections.

name: InterfaceConnection
desc: A connection between two InterfaceReferences.

name: InterfaceConnection.new
desc: Creates a new InterfaceConnection between two InterfaceReferences.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: InterfacePortReference
desc: A mixin that provides interface-specific behavior for port references.

name: direction
desc:
The effective direction of this port based on interface role and port
tags.

name: interfaceReference
desc: The interface that contains this port.

name: isDirectionless
desc: Whether this port has no directional tags.

name: port
desc: The appropriate logic port for this interface port reference.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: InterfaceReference
desc: A Reference to an interface on a BridgeModule.

name: addPortMap
desc: Creates a mapping between an interface port and a module port.

name: connectDownTo
desc: Establishes a hierarchical "downward" connection to a child interface.

name: connectTo
desc: Connects two interfaces at the same hierarchical level, sharing a parent.

name: connectUpTo
desc: Establishes a hierarchical "upward" connection to a parent interface.

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: interface
desc: The external interface instance that exists "outside" of the module.

name: internalInterface
desc: The internal interface instance that exists "inside" the module.

name: isFullyConnected
desc: Whether all interface ports are fully connected to module ports.

name: module
desc: The BridgeModule that this reference belongs to.

name: name
desc: The name of this interface within the module.

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: port
desc: Gets a reference to a specific port within this interface.

name: portMaps
desc: An unmodifiable list of all port mappings for this interface.

name: ports
desc: All port references that belong to this interface.

name: punchDownTo
desc: Creates a copy of this interface in a submodule.

name: punchUpTo
desc: Creates a copy of this interface in a parent module.

name: role
desc: The role that this interface plays in interface connections.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: LoggerError
desc: Extension on Logger to throw an exception if an error is encountered.

name: error
desc:
Creates a severe message and throws an exception if
RohdBridgeLogger.continueOnError is false.

name: sectionSeparator
desc: Log a section separator.

name: PortDirection
desc: A direction type for a port of a Module.

name: fromString
desc: Converts from a name of values to a PortDirection.

name: ofPort
desc: Identifies a Module's port into a PortDirection.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: PortMap
desc:
Represents a mapping between a PortReference and an
InterfacePortReference on a particular BridgeModule.

name: connect
desc:
Resolves a port map by connecting the port to the interfacePort in
the appropriate direction.

name: interfacePort
desc: A port on the Interface.

name: isConnected
desc:
Indicates that port and interfacePort are actually connected, not just
mapped pending a connection.

name: port
desc: A port on the Module.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: PortReference
desc: A Reference to a port on a BridgeModule.

name: PortReference.fromPort
desc: Creates a PortReference from an existing Logic port.

name: PortReference.fromString
desc:
Creates a PortReference from a BridgeModule and a port reference
string.

name: direction
desc: The direction of the port (input, output, or inOut).

name: drivesLogic
desc: Drives a Logic signal with this port's value.

name: gets
desc: Connects this port to be driven by other.

name: getsLogic
desc: Connects this port to be driven by a Logic signal.

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: module
desc: The BridgeModule that this reference belongs to.

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: operator []
desc: Gets a single bit of this port at the specified index.

name: port
desc: The actual Logic port that this reference points to.

name: portName
desc: The name of the port that this reference points to.

name: portSubset
desc: The port subset that this reference represents.

name: portSubsetLogic
desc: A Logic representation of the port subset.

name: punchDownTo
desc: Creates a matching port in a submodule and connects them.

name: punchUpTo
desc: Creates a matching port in the parent module and connects them.

name: replicateTo
desc: Creates a new port in the specified module with the given direction.

name: slice
desc: Creates a slice of this port from endIndex down to startIndex.

name: tieOff
desc: Ties this port to a constant value.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: width
desc: The bit width of this port reference.

name: RohdBridgeException
desc: Base class for Exceptions thrown by ROHD Bridge.

name: RohdBridgeException.new
desc: Creates a new exception with description message.

name: message
desc: A description of what this exception means.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: RohdBridgeLogger
desc: Loggger for ROHD Bridge tool

name: configureLogger
desc:
Sets up logging to dump to filePath and print to console based on
printLevel and rootLevel.

name: continueOnError
desc:
If set to true, then errors will be printed without causing an immediate
exception halting execution.

name: enableDebugMesage
desc:
If set totrue, some additional log will be printed
which will be helpful for debug

name: fileSink
desc: The file sink to write to.

name: flush
desc: Flush the file sink.

name: logger
desc: logger for rohd_bridge

name: terminate
desc: Terminate the logger and close the file sink.

name: RohdBridgeModuleExtensions
desc:
Extension methods for Module to provide additional functionality related
to ROHD Bridge.

name: findSubModule
desc:
Searches for one sub-module matching pattern in the same way as
findSubModules. If more than one module is found, an exception is
thrown.

name: findSubModules
desc:
Searches for sub-modules by instance name pattern within this Module.
The String representation being matched against uses / as a separator
for hierarchy.

name: getHierarchyDownTo
desc:
Returns a list of instances between calling module this and the provided
instance, where the first element is this and the last element is
instance.

name: hierarchicalName
desc: Provides a full hierarchical name based on hierarchy.

name: SliceInterfacePortReference
desc: A reference to a sliced portion of an interface port.

name: SliceInterfacePortReference.fromString
desc: Creates a slice reference from a port access string.

name: SliceInterfacePortReference.new
desc: Creates a reference to a sliced interface port.

name: interfaceReference
desc: The interface that contains this port.

name: slice
desc: Creates a slice of this port from endIndex down to startIndex.

name: SlicePortReference
desc:
A PortReference that provides access to sliced or indexed portions of a
port.

name: SlicePortReference.fromString
desc: Creates a slice port reference from a port access string.

name: SlicePortReference.new
desc: Creates a slice port reference with the specified parameters.

name: dimensionAccess
desc: Array dimension and/or bit indices for multi-dimensional array access.

name: drivesLogic
desc: Drives a Logic signal with this port's value.

name: extractPortAccessSliceComponents
desc: Extracts port access components from a port access string.

name: getUpdatedSliceIndices
desc: Computes new slice indices when creating a sub-slice of this reference.

name: gets
desc: Connects this port to be driven by other.

name: getsLogic
desc: Connects this port to be driven by a Logic signal.

name: hasSlicing
desc: Whether this reference includes slicing.

name: portSubset
desc: The port subset that this reference represents.

name: replicateTo
desc: Creates a new port in the specified module with the given direction.

name: slice
desc: Creates a slice of this port from endIndex down to startIndex.

name: sliceLowerIndex
desc: The lower bound of the slice (inclusive).

name: sliceUpperIndex
desc: The upper bound of the slice (inclusive).

name: subsetDimensions
desc: The array dimensions of the port subset, if applicable.

name: subsetElementWidth
desc: The bit width of the port subset this reference represents.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: StandardInterfacePortReference
desc: A reference to a complete, unsliced port within an interface.

name: StandardInterfacePortReference.new
desc: Creates a reference to a complete interface port.

name: interfaceReference
desc: The interface that contains this port.

name: slice
desc: Creates a slice of this port from endIndex down to startIndex.

name: StandardPortReference
desc: A PortReference that refers to a complete, unsliced port.

name: StandardPortReference.new
desc: Creates a StandardPortReference for the specified port.

name: drivesLogic
desc: Drives a Logic signal with this port's value.

name: gets
desc: Connects this port to be driven by other.

name: getsLogic
desc: Connects this port to be driven by a Logic signal.

name: portSubset
desc: The port subset that this reference represents.

name: replicateTo
desc: Creates a new port in the specified module with the given direction.

name: slice
desc: Creates a slice of this port from endIndex down to startIndex.

name: connectInterfaces
desc:
Connects intf1 to intf2, creating all necessary ports through the
hierarchy.

name: connectPorts
desc:
Makes a connection from driver to receiver, punching ports along the way
as necessary.

name: findCommonParent
desc:
Returns the common parent of two modules firstChild and secondChild
Assuming at least one common parent exists
